title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8114.21 - Town of Amherst
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8114.21 - Town of Amherst

State Regulations
(a) French

Road. The eastbound and westbound roadways of French Road between IR 990, the

Lockport Expressway, and Route 263. (b) Route 263. Route 263 between Route 78 and
IR 290. (c) Wehrle Drive. Wehrle

Drive between Route 78, Transit Road, and Curtwright Drive. (d) Curtwright Drive. Curtwright Drive
between Wehrle Drive and Lawrence Bell Drive. (e) Maple Road (CR 192). Maple Road between

Route 78 and US Route 62 (Niagara Falls Boulevard). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8114.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
